00025 //
00026 // Flush the buffer and copy the chars from begin to end to the buffer.
00027 //
00028 static const char *const substr(const char * begin, 
00029                 const char * end, 
00030                 char * buf, 
00031                 int bufsize) throw()
00032 {
00033     try{
00034         std::fill(buf, buf+bufsize, '\0');
00035         std::copy(begin, end, buf);
00036     }
00037     catch(...)
00038     {
00039         cerr << "substr() shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;
00040         abort();
00041     }
00042     return buf;
00043 }

00072 const SpkCompilerError::ErrorMap SpkCompilerError::mapping = SpkCompilerError::initErrorMap();
00073 const char* SpkCompilerError::describe( enum ErrorCode key )
00074 {
00075   ErrorMap::const_iterator ptr = mapping.find(key);
00076   if( ptr != mapping.end() )
00077     return (*ptr).second;
00078   else
00079     return "No description registered.";
00080 }
00081 unsigned int SpkCompilerError::maxErrorcode() throw()
00082 {
00083   return static_cast<unsigned int>( pow( 2.0, (double)sizeof( int ) /*bytes*/ * 7 /* 8 bits - a signed bit*/ ) - 1 );
00084   /*
00085     try{
00086         unsigned int max = 0;

00090         }
00091         return max;
00092     }
00093     catch(...)
00094     {
00095         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::maxErrorcode() shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;
00096         abort();
00097     }

00100 unsigned int SpkCompilerError::maxLinenum() throw()
00101 {
00102     try{
00103         unsigned int max = 0;
00104         for(unsigned int i=1, multiplier=1; i<=LINENUM_FIELD_LEN; i++, multiplier*=10)
00105         {
00106             max += multiplier*9;
00107         }
00108         return max;
00109     }
00110     catch(...)
00111     {
00112         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::maxLinenum() shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;
00113         abort();
00114     }
00115 }

00145 SpkCompilerError::SpkCompilerError(enum ErrorCode ecode, const char* mess, unsigned int line, const char* file) throw() 
00146 : myErrorCode(ecode), myLineNum(line)
00147 {
00148     try{
00149       if( strlen(file) > maxFilenameLen() )
00150       {
00151         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00152         cerr << "The length of a filename must be less than " << strlen(myFileName) << endl;
00153         cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00154         abort();
00155         
00156       }
00157         strcpy(myFileName, file);
00158         strcpy(myMessage, mess);
00159     }
00160     catch( ... )
00161     {
00162         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::operator= shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;
00163         abort();
00164     }
00165 }
00166 SpkCompilerError::SpkCompilerError( const std::exception& e, const char* mess, unsigned int line, const char* file) throw()
00167 : myErrorCode(SpkCompilerError::ASPK_STD_ERR), myLineNum(line)
00168 {
00169     try{
00170       if( strlen(mess) > maxMessageLen() )
00171       {
00172         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00173         cerr << "The length of a message must be less than " << strlen(myMessage) << endl;
00174         cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00175         abort();
00176         
00177       }
00178       if( strlen(file) > maxFilenameLen() )
00179       {
00180         cerr << "Unrecoverable error occured at " << __LINE__ << " in " << __FILE__ << endl;
00181         cerr << "The length of a filename must be less than " << strlen(myFileName) << endl;
00182         cerr << "System terminates..." << endl;
00183         abort();
00184         
00185       }
00186         strcpy(myFileName, file);
00187         strcpy(myMessage, mess);
00188         strcat(myMessage, "\n");
00189         strcat(myMessage, e.what());
00190         strcat(myMessage, "\n");
00191     }
00192     catch( ... )
00193     {
00194         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::operator= shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;
00195         abort();
00196     }
00197 }

00221 {
00222     // This is doing deep copy
00223     try{
00224         myErrorCode      = right.myErrorCode;
00225         myLineNum        = right.myLineNum;
00226         strcpy(myFileName, right.myFileName);
00227         strcpy(myMessage,  right.myMessage);
00228         return *this;

00230     catch( ... )
00231     {
00232         cerr << "SpkCompilerError::operator= shall not throw... terminating..." << endl;

00266 const std::string SpkCompilerError::getXml() const
00267 {
00268     ostringstream o;
00269     string m = myMessage;
00270 
00271     //
00272     // escape XML sensitive characters { <, >, & }
00273     // '&' must be replaced first because < and > will be replaced by
00274     // words containing '&'.
00275     // 
00276     for( int i = m.find( '&', 0 ); i != string::npos; i = m.find( '&', i+1 ) )
00277       {
00278     m.erase( i, 1 );
00279     m.insert( i, "&amp;" );
00280       }
00281     for( int i = m.find( '<', 0 ); i != string::npos; i = m.find( '<', i ) )
00282       {
00283     m.erase( i, 1 );
00284     m.insert( i, "&lt;" );
00285       }
00286     for( int i = m.find( '>', 0 ); i != string::npos; i = m.find( '>', i ) )
00287       {
00288     m.erase( i, 1 );
00289     m.insert( i, "&gt;" );
00290       }
00291 
00292     o << "<error>"          << endl;
00293     o << "   <code>"        << this->describe(myErrorCode) << "</code>"        << endl;
00294     o << "   <file_name>"   << myFileName  << "</file_name>"   << endl;
00295     o << "   <line_number>" << myLineNum   << "</line_number>" << endl;
00296     o << "   <message>"     << m   << "</message>"     << endl;
00297     o << "</error>"         << endl;
00298     return o.str();
00299 }

00319 const SpkCompilerError::ErrorMap SpkCompilerError::initErrorMap()
00320 {
00321     //
00322     // Filling the error code-message map
00323     //
00324     ErrorMap tmpMap;
00325     
00326     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_STD_ERR,        "ASPK_STD_ERR") );
00327     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR,   "ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR") );
00328     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_DATAML_ERR,     "ASPK_DATAML_ERR") );
00329     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_FTOC_ERR,       "ASPK_FOTC_ERR") );
00330     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_UNKNOWN_ERR,    "ASPK_UNKNOWN_ERR") );
00331     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, "ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR") );
00332     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_XMLDOM_ERR,     "ASPK_XMLDOM_ERR") );
00333     tmpMap.insert( ErrorMap::value_type(ASPK_USER_ERR,       "ASPK_USER_ERR" ) );
00334     return tmpMap;
00335 }
